Control Name: COST 1.5 Report and notify on cost optimization
Control Statement: Conﬁgure AWS Budgets to provide notiﬁcations on cost and usage against targets. Have regular meetings to analyze this workload's cost eﬃciency and to promote cost aware culture.

control_attributes.Control: COST 1.5 Report and notify on cost optimization
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you implement cloud ﬁnancial management?
